<when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("enable_routing_switch", "").Equals("true"))">
      <set-variable name="baseUrl" value="@{
                        var configuration = JArray.Parse(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("configuration"));

                        // get random number
                        var rand = new Random();
                        int random = rand.Next(0, 100);

                        // priority is given by list order. add field for sorting the priority
                        int currentRouting = 0;
                        foreach (JObject item in configuration) {
                            currentRouting += int.Parse(item.GetValue("routing").ToString());
                            if (random <= currentRouting) {
                                return item.GetValue("node_uri").ToString();
                            }
                        }

                        return context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("baseUrl", "");
      }" />

fragment.when:
<set-variable name="is_whitelisted" value="@{
                        // isWhiteListed if:
                        // - lists are empties
                        // - channelId, brokerPSP and stationId belong to relative lists

                        bool isWhitelisted = false;
                        string[] brokers = ((string) context.Variables["wisp_whitelisted_brokers"]).Split(',');
                        string[] channels = ((string) context.Variables["wisp_whitelisted_channels"]).Split(',');
                        string[] stations = ((string) context.Variables["wisp_whitelisted_stations"]).Split(',');

                        if (brokers.Count() == 0 && channels.Count() == 0 && stations.Count() == 0) {
                            isWhitelisted = true;
                            return isWhitelisted;
                        }

                        XElement doc = context.Request.Body.As(preserveContent: true);
                        try {
                            XElement body = doc.Descendants(doc.Name.Namespace + "Body").FirstOrDefault();
                            XElement primitive = (XElement) body.FirstNode;
                            string channelId = (string) primitive.Descendants("identificativoCanale").FirstOrDefault();
                            string pspBrokerId = (string) primitive.Descendants("identificativoIntermediarioPSP").FirstOrDefault();

                            // check stations only if whitelist contains at least one element
                            bool isStationOk = true;
                            if (stations.Count() > 0) {
                                XElement header = doc.Descendants(doc.Name.Namespace + "Header").FirstOrDefault();
                                XElement primitiveHeader = (XElement) body.FirstNode;
                                string stationId = (string) primitiveHeader.Descendants("identificativoStazioneIntermediarioPA").FirstOrDefault();
                                isStationOk = stations.Contains(stationId);
                            }

                            isWhitelisted = brokers.Contains(pspBrokerId) && channels.Contains(channelId) && isStationOk;
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            // do nothing
                        }
                        return isWhitelisted;
                    }" />
